When Oscar Diggs (James Franco), an unimpressive magical circus dubious ethics is away from dusty Kansas and ends in the vibrant Land of Oz, he thinks he hit the jackpot - and that fame and fortune await - so until he finds three witches, Theodora (Mila Kunis), Evanora (Rachel Weisz) and Glinda (Michelle Williams), who are not convinced he is the great wizard everyone is waiting. Reluctantly involved in issues that epic Land of Oz and its inhabitants face, Oscar must find out who is good and who is evil before it is too late. Drawing on his magic through illusion, ingenuity and even a little magic, Oscar becomes not only the great and powerful Wizard of Oz but into a better man.
